commitMessage:
refactor: Implement User Use Cases and finalize Clean Architecture (Phase 3 & 4)

- Implemented Ticket and User Use Cases (Create, Update, List, Sync, Associations)
- Refactored Routes (tickets.ts, users.ts) to use Controllers/Use Cases
- Updated Repositories (FirestoreTicketRepository, FirestoreUserRepository)
- Replaced legacy integration tests with Unit Tests (solutions.test.ts, partners.test.ts, stats.test.ts)
- Verified full test suite passing
